overview: Misha tells her BFF, Vanessa, that she needs something to take her mind off her ex-boyfriend. Vanessa invites Misha into a 3-some with her guy Adam. Knowing Misha needs more, Vanessa tells her to invite Adam over to her place for some 1-on-1 action. This leads to Vanessa and Misha going full lesbo on each other.
title: A Blonde Gone Wild
